comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: Brother to the Czar, heir to the throne after the royal family was murdered, never ratified and later murdered as well. Sometimes referred to as the last Czar by historians. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Duke_Michael_Alexandrovich_of...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Kilted Cowboy: Thank you for the additional information about Grand Duke Michael Alexandrovich. We will include some of it in the description when we update.

comment.author: 15851364@N08
comment._content: This photo is incorrectly identified. The names are reversed. This is GD Alexander Mikhailovich. He was 1st cousin once removed and brother-in-law of Tsar Nicholas II: the husband of Nicholas' sister GDss Xenia Alexandrova. He was also the author of 'Once a Grand Duke',  'Always a Grand Duke', and another book whose name escapes me.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: hisimperial majesty:  Thank you for providing us with the correct information here.  We'll fix our description next time we update.

comment._content: This is Sandro, not Michael, and the label has still not been corrected.
